main_definition: In a given context, 'usually' refers to something that occurs most of the time or as a general rule.

meanings_and_examples.example: I usually have cereal for breakfast.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Predominantly, the majority of the time
meanings_and_examples.example: She usually goes to bed early on weekdays.

meanings_and_examples.definition: As a general rule or norm
meanings_and_examples.example: It is unusual for him to miss work without notice. He usually shows up every day.
